data.text: @agavek As you might be aware, situation with Covid as well as imposed restrictions from the countries can change very rapidly, therefore there can be schedule adjustments for the flights in the future. Thanks for your understanding in this situation.

@RichardGerrar17 Hello! Thanks for the suggestion. Unfortunately not this season, however we kindly invite you to follow our social media channels in the future for the latest news regarding our destinations!

We are back in the sky! ✈️ Get familiar with our new updated routemap gradually offering flights to more than 50 destinations from Riga as well as Tallinn and Vilnius! 🌍
Explore more: https://t.co/T7GmNYnlI7 https://t.co/BH4EUPaLye

data.text: @XavC6775 Hello! Unfortunately at this moment we don't yet have a precise date when flights on these routes might be resumed. Please check our webpage for the latest details: https://t.co/i0L9jnVk2y

Šodien @riga_airport kopā ar @Sat_Min preses konferencē informējām sabiedrību un medijus par jaunajiem veselības drošības pasākumiem un @airbaltic atsāktajiem regulārajiem lidojumiem. Foto: @riga_airport https://t.co/kQtIb5qgn5

urls.title: Online payment form | airBaltic
urls.description: You can use this form to apply for flight date/time change and/or passenger name change, or to pay for baggage, sports equipment, and inflight meals.

data.text: @currentlyjudged Hello Hermine! Thank you for reaching out to us. Yes, that is possible. You can add another checked baggage to your reservation via “Manage My Booking” on our web page or by using the following online form: https://t.co/iT3Sea68kI

@PGerdzhikov @Gaussm Hello once again! As our agent answered previously, as soon as it will be possible by all the parties, baggage will be sent to you. For more details you may contact the agent, however, please be informed that due to high workload it may take more time for an answer. Thank you.

@Lavrra Labdien! Jā, protams - šobrīd visām iegādātajām biļetēm (līdz pat 31.maijam) piedāvājam iespēju mainīt lidojuma datumu! Lūdzam gan ņemt vērā, ka lidojuma maiņas pieprasījums jāveic pirms iegādātā lidojuma datuma.

A long-awaited moment is finally here! 😍 As of today we resume our regular flights. Look up in the skies - you'll see our green tails there much more often! 📸 by Kristīne Limare https://t.co/XGI1Y5I1nY

@carmen_co Hello Carmen! Thanks for your message. Please know we have already replied to your private message. Allow us to continue our conversation there! We kindly advise to delete your tweet as it contains sensitive information such as your booking reference number. Thank you!

data.text: @MariaGBergersen Hello! Thanks for your message. Flights available for purchase currently are scheduled to be performed as planned. For more details please visit our Travel Updates frequently: https://t.co/i0L9jnVk2y

urls.title: Booking Cancellation | airBaltic
urls.description: We know that sometimes plans change and you might need to cancel our flights. Find out about available refund options depending on your ticket type.

data.text: @RedWingsTiffany Hello Tiffany! Thank you for reaching out to us. We advise two options in this case: 1) Request refund via “Manage my booking” on our web page or 2) Use the online form here: https://t.co/6KPJ8x5ELK
@AlekseiVorobjov Hello! Thanks for your message. Please check your direct messages as we have already replied there. Thank you!

We care for your well-being! From now on @airBaltic fleet will consist only of the Airbus A220-300 aircraft, which will provide environmentally friendly flights, unsurpassed comfort and modern air filtration systems for benefit of our passengers! https://t.co/bD4G5DksUh
@MichaelAnywar Hello Michael! Thanks for your message. Please know we have replied to your private message. Allow us to continue our conversation there! Thank you.
@andr As we advised, please contact our Reservations department, our colleagues will advise for the particular reservation.

urls.title: Frequently asked question about airBaltic
urls.description: We're here to help you! Helpful answers to your questions and useful contacts to find out everything you need about your flight.

data.text:
@andr Hello! If the flight was cancelled from our side when your reservation was still active and you requested a refund, please contact our Reservations department, our colleagues will advise:
https://t.co/UWa844vRzD

Mūsu pasažieru, darbinieku un sabiedrības drošība un veselība ir galvenā prioritāte. Turpinām rūpīgi strādāt, lai nodrošinātu, ka varat ceļot droši, elastīgi un ar pārliecību. Aicinām iepazīties ar jaunajiem veselības drošības pasākumiem. Uzzini vairāk: https://t.co/kfoyJl4goY https://t.co/PR4OyiMQPQ

The health and well-being of our passengers, employees and society stand above all. We continue to work hard to ensure you can travel safely, flexibly, and with confidence. Follow the new health measures to protect yourself and fellow travelers. Read more: https://t.co/oAUbmuEFRC https://t.co/WxbqrT33TG
@ZaneMiluna Labdien! Jā, reisi ir tikuši publicēti pēc visu atļauju saņemšanas. Otrā jautājuma sakarā gan atbildi Jums nemācēsim sniegt.
@BalticBlues Hello! Please check direct messages where we have provided answer on this. Thank you.

data.text: @Georgs1996 @laucins Labvakar! Ja biļetes iegādātas pie mums (https://t.co/GfcUoxzmDg mājaslapā) lūdzam DM ziņā privāti atsūtīt sīkākas detaļas par savu rezervāciju, kā arī rezervācijas numuru. Paldies!

We have scheduled additional special flight on a route Riga–Baku–Frankfurt–Riga on May 11. It is possible to purchase tickets for each segment as well as for a flight from Baku to Riga via Frankfurt. Book tickets for these flights via special phone line: https://t.co/xY2EkARtIQ https://t.co/6P7aveXtRn

11. maijā @airBaltic izpildīs vēl vienu īpašo reisu turp un atpakaļ maršrutā Rīga–Baku–Frankfurte–Rīga. Biļetes var iegādāties uz katru lidojuma segmentu, kā arī no Baku uz Rīgu caur Frankfurti. Rezervēt biļetes var, zvanot uz īpašo tālruņa līniju: https://t.co/YJO0QLza33 https://t.co/wGVyQfTyF1

@laucins Labdien! Ja vēlaties mums nosūtīt kādus ieteikumus, vai pateicību, to iespējams izdarīt šeit:
https://t.co/bP9xwYHd9S

@Sarma_Freiberga Labdien! Līdz ar vakardienas vēlā vakara lēmumu pagarināt valsts ārkārtas situāciju, šobrīd strādājam pie lidojuma grafika labojumiem. Pasažieru drošība ir un vienmēr būs mūsu galvenā prioritāte.
Paldies par sapratni un pacietību.

"Currently we are in the process of revising @airBaltic business model to come back better than we were before. We aim to modernize our product and become greener, cleaner and more easily approachable by customers." Read the message from our CEO, @Gaussm: https://t.co/O1GMpSxXkG https://t.co/cQb11B1MnS

data.text: The Cabinet of Ministers of the Republic of Latvia, as the major shareholder of Latvian airline, has today approved the investment of up to EUR 250 million into the equity of @airBaltic to overcome the economic crisis caused by COVID-19. Read more: https://t.co/ojvFsqTwVw https://t.co/OxiaKpFzUe

Latvijas Republikas Ministru kabinets kā galvenais Latvijas lidsabiedrības akcionārs šodien apstiprināja plānu ieguldīt @airBaltic pamatkapitālā līdz 250 miljoniem eiro, lai uzņēmums varētu pārvarēt COVID-19 izraisīto ekonomisko krīzi. Vairāk: https://t.co/qqSZdgeCmt https://t.co/vB1TiSXtOC

urls.title: Visbiežāk uzdotie jautājumi - sazinies ar mums | airBaltic
urls.description: Meklē atbildes uz interesējošiem jautājumiem un atrodi noderīgus kontaktus, lai varētu ar mums sazināties neskaidrību gadījumā. Mēs ar prieku palīdzēsim!

data.text:
@UgisB Sīkāku jautājumu sakarā par Jūsu konkrēto rezervāciju varam aicināt sazināties ar mūsu Rezervāciju departamentu:

@UgisB Labdien! Kā jau informējām iepriekš, lielās darba noslodzes dēļ pieprasījumu apstrāde var aizņemt daudz ilgāku laiku kā ierasts. Sīkāku jautājumu sakarā par konkrēto rezervāciju varam aicināt sazināties ar mūsu Rezervāciju departamentu. Paldies par sapratni.

data.text: @NzeMike Hello! Thanks for your message. Due to the increased amount of incoming requests, processing them can take more time than usual. Refund can be expected within 90 days from time request has been processed (for tickets purchased on https://t.co/YZH2a4156m). Thank you for patience!

@karenjaunzems Hello, Karen! Thanks for your message. Unfortunately, due to the increased amount of incoming requests, processing them can take more time than usual.
Please feel free to contact us via our international line: +371 6700 6006 or e-mail address reservations@airbaltic.com.
Paldies par brīvību, kas ļauj spārnus plest plašāk un aizlidot tālāk, lai vienmēr atkal atgrieztos mājās! Sirsnīgi sveicam Latvijas neatkarības atjaunošanas 30. gadadienā! https://t.co/UDIQUw1nuQ

data.text: @BiroCliffy We do understand your disappointment however we would like to inform that due to Covid crisis we have been forced to cancel flights for hundreds of thousands of passengers, therefore, due to high workload refund time may be much longer than usual. Thank you.

data.text: @TheAviationMAN_ Hello! Due to high workload refund time may be up to 90 days (if the tickets were purchased on https://t.co/GfcUoxzmDg) once the request has been processed. Thanks for patience.

We have scheduled additional special flights from Amsterdam (on May 11 and May 12) to Riga and vice versa. We will also perform flights from Frankfurt, Oslo and Helsinki to Riga and back. Book tickets for these flights by calling special phone line: https://t.co/xY2EkARtIQ https://t.co/aoqYQH5d42

airBaltic izpildīs vēl īpašos lidojumus no Amsterdamas (11. un 12. maijā) papildu jau iepriekš plānotajiem lidojumiem no Amsterdamas, Frankfurtes, Oslo un Helsinkiem uz Rīgu un atpakaļ. Rezervēt biļetes iespējams, zvanot uz īpašo tālruņa līniju: https://t.co/YJO0QLza33 https://t.co/VuntmQ7YIs

Great news for @airBaltic Club members! The current tier status of loyalty program members alongside all of their benefits have been extended for six months beyond its current expiry. Read more: https://t.co/7gAvGijnCy https://t.co/8Axm2s7ZHW
